answers.answer: It  could be from both these things or UTI.  Did you ever get the results from the diabetes testing?  If not, call to find out.When was the last time you had you had unprotected sex?  A test will typical detect pregnancy about 2 weeks after conception.

hi spade yes i did get my diabetes results and they came back as normal, i had a water sample tested on 13th sept and nothing was detected then! And i have had unprotected sex since then.Im also on motilium for nausea and acid reflux so maybe it could be the tab??:)

question: Hi i wonder whether anyone can help me for the past week i have been in and out of the bathroom (pee) its like ive drank loads of liquids when if fact ive only had 2 drinks! I had diabetes n bloods done bout month ago so dont think its that. I had my urine checked and a pregnancy teston the 13 of september. Everything came back normal.I came off the pill around 6-7 weeks ago could this be a sign of coming of the pill, or could i be in very early stages of pregnancy?? :)
title: urinating more from coming off pill or pregnancy?!
